name: many-words
description: A WebApp to help you learn foreign languages vocabulary

scripts.build_and_move: cd client && npm run build && cd ../tools && node insert_build.js
scripts.counter: cd tools && npm run word_counter && cd .. && npm run lint:web-app-exercises && npm run lint:server-exercises
scripts.dev: cd deploy/development && docker-compose -f docker-compose.development.yml -p manywords-dev up
scripts.dev-detached: cd deploy/development && docker-compose -f docker-compose.development.yml -p manywords-dev  up --detach && npm run logs
scripts.dev-down: cd deploy/development && docker-compose -f docker-compose.development.yml -p manywords-dev down
scripts.prod: cd deploy/production && npm run set-prod-env && docker-compose -f docker-compose.production.yml up --build
scripts.prod-detached: npm run set-prod-env && docker-compose -f docker-compose.production.yml up --build --detach && npm run logs
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install && cd ../tools && npm install
scripts.logs: gnome-terminal --tab -t web-app -- docker logs manywords-web-app -f ; gnome-terminal --tab -t server -- docker logs manywords-server -f ; gnome-terminal --tab -t mongo -- docker logs  manywords-mongo -f ; gnome-terminal --tab -t seeder -- docker logs manywords-database-seeder -f
scripts.logs:test: gnome-terminal --tab -t test-server -- docker logs manywords-test-server -f ; gnome-terminal --tab -t server-test-runner -- docker attach manywords-server-test-runner; gnome-terminal --tab -t test-seeder -- docker logs manywords-test-database-seeder -f
scripts.test: cd deploy/tests && docker-compose -f docker-compose.test.yml -p manywords-test up
scripts.test-detached: cd deploy/tests && docker-compose -f docker-compose.test.yml -p manywords-test up --detach && npm run logs:test
scripts.test-down: cd deploy/tests && docker-compose -f docker-compose.test.yml -p manywords-test down

author: Camille HAGENBOURGER
